params.user_prompt: I have a transparent image of "{{step1.output}}". I will add a new background using an AI model. Please follow these guidelines: Images with light, monochromatic backgrounds should be used; images with bright-colored or cluttered backgrounds should be avoided; Try to make images for products from the same store in a uniform style; Don't use an excessive amount of images for creating a collage; You may add readable instructions or examples, showing how to use the product in an image. Strictly follow this rule: What you give me is directly copy-pasted and converted into an AI model. Prepare the prompt accordingly. Don't write too long. AI models that create images do not work on very long texts.

params.negative_prompt: (deformed iris, deformed pupils, semi-realistic, cgi, 3d, render, sketch, cartoon, drawing, anime, mutated hands and fingers:1.4), (deformed, distorted, disfigured:1.3), poorly drawn, bad anatomy, wrong anatomy, extra limb, missing limb, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, ugly, disgusting, amputation
params.prompt: {{step2.output}},RAW photo, 8k uhd, dslr, soft lighting, high quality,
